tool_description: A web service designed to provide detailed information about an IP address. When called with a specific IP address, it returns valuable data including the IP's geographical location, the associated ISP, the type of connection, and potentially more.
title: IP Insight

api_list.name: Get Geolocation Data
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ip-insight.p.rapidapi.com/geo"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ip-insight.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get IP Address
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ip-insight.p.rapidapi.com/ip"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ip-insight.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
